articles.title: Minnesota FBI head to help lead counterterrorism division
articles.description: MINNEAPOLIS (AP) — The head of the FBI's field office in Minnesota has been named assistant director of the agency's counterterrorism division, the FBI announced Wednesday.
articles.content:
MINNEAPOLIS (AP) The head of the FBI's field office in Minnesota has been named assistant director of the agency's counterterrorism division, the FBI announced Wednesday.
Jill Sanborn has been the special agent in charge of the Minneapolis field office since… [+1169 chars]

articles.title: Defending champion Yule leads 1st run of Campiglio slalom
articles.description: MADONNA DI CAMPIGLIO, Italy (AP) — Returning to the site of his only World Cup victory, Swiss skier Daniel Yule led the opening run of a night slalom Wednesday on the steep and icy Canalone Miramonti course.
articles.content:
MADONNA DI CAMPIGLIO, Italy (AP) Returning to the site of his only World Cup victory, Swiss skier Daniel Yule led the opening run of a night slalom Wednesday on the steep and icy Canalone Miramonti course.
Yule finished 0.19 seconds ahead of race favorite He… [+861 chars]

articles.author: By LARRY LAGE AP Sports Writer
articles.title: George Perles, longtime Michigan State coach, dies at 85
articles.description: George Perles, who coached Michigan State to a Rose Bowl victory in 1988 and was an assistant for the dominant Pittsburgh Steelers teams of the 1970s that won four Super Bowls, died Tuesday, the school said. He was 85.
articles.content:
George Perles, who coached Michigan State to a Rose Bowl victory in 1988 and was an assistant for the dominant Pittsburgh Steelers teams of the 1970s that won four Super Bowls, died Tuesday, the school said. He was 85.
Perles played football at Michigan Stat… [+5391 chars]

articles.title: Memorial proposed for N Carolina college shooting victims
articles.description: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — A committee formed in the wake of a shooting on a North Carolina college campus last April has proposed a $1 million memorial to honor the victims.
articles.content:
CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) A committee formed in the wake of a shooting on a North Carolina college campus last April has proposed a $1 million memorial to honor the victims.
The commission at UNC Charlotte recommended creating a significant, focal memorial and co… [+1540 chars]
